entries.title: Redstone Engineering Kit
entries.description: Unleash your inner engineer with this kit. Whether you're building a door or a doomsday device, we've got the components you need to make it overly complicated.

entries.title: Wheat Seeds
entries.description: Sow the seeds of a future harvest—assuming it doesn't get eaten by something first. DANDYCORP assumes no responsibility for crop failure.

entries.title: Carrot
entries.description: An orange root vegetable that’s as good for your health as it is for distracting your workforce with the promise of a better tomorrow.

entries.title: Oak Sapling
entries.description: Plant it, and with enough time (and a little corporate magic), you’ll have yourself a nice, tall reminder of the forests we destroyed.

entries.title: Melon Seeds
entries.description: Sweet, juicy, and perfect for a hot day. Provided that the DANDYCORP-approved weather doesn’t ruin your crops.

entries.title: Pumpkin Seeds
entries.description: Spooky season or not, these seeds are ready to grow into the most versatile vegetable you’ll ever exploit for profit.

entries.title: Iron Ingot
entries.description: Another proud result of DANDYCORP's relentless mining operations. Refined, durable, and completely devoid of guilt!

entries.title: Gold Ingot
entries.description: Nothing says 'luxury' like a metal ripped from the earth with zero regard for environmental impact. Go ahead, indulge!

entries.title: Diamond
entries.description: The hardest substance known to man, brought to you by the hardest-working (and poorly compensated) miners around.

entries.title: Emerald
entries.description: DANDYCORP's token of appreciation—just kidding, it’s a symbol of how we trade value for your compliance.

entries.title: Coal
entries.description: Fossilized remnants of an era when the planet still had hope. Burn it like there's no tomorrow—because there might not be!

entries.title: Revive
entries.description: For when your Pokémon just couldn’t keep it together. Revive them and send them right back into battle. No rest for the weary.

entries.title: Mewtwo
entries.description: A genetically engineered psychic powerhouse with a chip on its shoulder. Might overthrow your entire operation, but until then, it's a great asset.

entries.title: Arceus
entries.description: The original creator, now repackaged as a limited edition asset. Worship it as you worship your quarterly profits.

entries.title: Shiny Pikachu
entries.description: The face of your corporate mascot, now in a rare, sparkly variant. Electrify your brand with this elusive charm.

entries.title: Chromium Ingot
entries.description: A metal uniquely brought to you by DANDYCORP. We are mostly certain it is not sentient, so it should not feel pain when you exploit it.
